578.96.text:

724.20.text:

730.01.text:

you can come back again, rebuild, and move

And this gets to, also, one of the great myths

1302.53.text:
I use the word capitalism, because sometimes

1309.81.text:

1328.51.text:
The myths are that capitalism is cold, based

1344.73.text:

It's never put on the same moral plain as

1358.18.text:
It's seen as commerce on one side, philanthropy

Research has shown that in Hollywood, businessmen—and

1372.23.text:
kill more people in Hollywood movies than

1378.58.text:

1404.34.text:
commerce and philanthropy are two sides of

Now what is the moral basis of free markets,

1413.97.text:
You succeed only by providing something that

1425.06.text:
Even if you're that Hollywood caricature,

1429.68.text:

1436.80.text:

1440.68.text:
that money unless you provide something that

Now, sometimes in terms of the marketplace,

1462.54.text:

1467.41.text:

1469.46.text: If they do, you both benefit.

1482.79.text:
So even if you're that Hollywood cliché,

1488.78.text:
And this gets to why, without ever realizing

1500.68.text:
Greed means taking something that doesn't

Transactions mean you go to a restaurant,

1508.66.text: They provide you with drink and food.

1511.06.text:

1514.06.text:
Each gets something in the transaction that's

1516.82.text:
Now some transactions, it’s true, are more

1521.09.text:
Buying a pair of shoes, or a purse, or a fancy

1526.71.text:

And capitalism also brings about cooperation

Call and supply chains, even the simplest

1580.85.text:
Numerous parts all coming together, involving

1590.22.text:
